items.name: All Together IPA
items.desc:
This is a West Coast style IPA, punchy and bright. It's part of a worldwide collaboration with Other Half Brewing with the aim of supporting hospitality workers who have been affected by the Covid-19 pandemic. Read more here!
Canopy will donate £1 from each can that we sell retail, or £5 from each case sold to trade to the Licensed Trade Charity to support bar, pub and brewery workers. The Licensed Trade Charity offers practical, emotional and financial help to those working in the licensed trade, and we're pleased to be able to support the work that they are doing.
This beer helps us, you get a beer out of it, and it helps workers in an industry that is facing some uncertain times.
You're going to feel great drinking this beer.

items.name: Brockwell IPA
items.desc:
Like its namesake, the park next to our brewery, our Brockwell IPA is a beer to enjoy in the sunshine relaxing with friends. Grab a football, a frisbee, maybe even a barbecue, this is a beer for those long lazy days that you never want to end.
It’s juicy, tropical and completely crushable, and those citra hops hide that 5.6% abv pretty well. Go on, you earned it.
Suitable for vegans

items.name: Champion Kölsch
items.desc:
This is our take on a Kölsch, a classic beer style from Cologne, Germany. Cold-fermented and long-matured this lager is crisp, dry and very refreshing. Best served ice cold, and best enjoyed after a match, a race, or a run ‘round the park.
Keep a few cans in the fridge ready to celebrate your next sporting achievement, however big or small.
Suitable for vegans.

items.name: Oompah Lager
items.desc: With a full Munich malt base this Oktober-fest ready Märzen style lager is ready for any autumnal day. The easy drinkability of lager with a bready, malty and very autumnal biscuity backbone.

items.name: Radler Paradisi
items.desc:
Citrus x paradisi (grapefruit) + Radler (beer and lemonade) = Radler paradisi.
Your one-stop grapefruit soda + beer, with freshly juiced grapefruit soda combined with zesty pale ale for your in-face refreshment.
A collaboration with Steep Soda Co.
STEEPSODA.CO

items.name: Snapper Session IPA
items.desc:
Crack the code and crack a smile: say hello to Snapper! Snapper is the little brother to our NEIPA Snap and joins our core range in 330ml can. Spritzy, light and fruity, this hazy IPA is a happy little addition to our line up.
Suitable for vegans.

items.name: Sunray Pale Ale
items.desc:
This is the beer to reward yourself with after a hard day grafting or crafting. A real easy-drinking pale ale dry-hopped with Chinook, at a perfectly sessionable 4.2% abv.
A beer for all occasions, not just when the sun is shining.
Suitable for vegans.

items.name: Trail Mix XPA
items.desc:
The beer that feels like taking your boots off after a hike – even if that only took you as far as the park.
Post-adventure refreshment, for when you’ve really earnt it.
A collaboration with:
discoversalkan.com

items.name: Up the Creek Kviek IPA
items.desc:
Up the Creek - a nod to the Norwegian origins of the kviek yeast or a tacit acknowledgement of the current situation?
Who knows, or cares? What you do need to know is that this is a juicy, hazy, hop-packed delicious beer. The Kviek yeast seems to bind to the hops and adds a wonderful spiciness. Delicious.
